---
title: "Activity in R on github"
author: "Pierce Edmiston"
output:
  html_document:
    theme: flatly
---

```{r setup}
library(dplyr)

devtools::load_all("githubarchive")
data("activity")

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(activity, aes(x = created_at)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(color = type)) +
  facet_wrap("type")
```
